00007 inline void integrateSingleTransform( __global b3RigidBodyData_t* bodies,int nodeID, float timeStep, float angularDamping, b3Float4ConstArg gravityAcceleration)
00008 {
00009         
00010         if (bodies[nodeID].m_invMass != 0.f)
00011         {
00012                 float BT_GPU_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD = (0.25f * 3.14159254f);
00013 
00014                 //angular velocity
00015                 {
00016                         b3Float4 axis;
00017                         //add some hardcoded angular damping
00018                         bodies[nodeID].m_angVel.x *= angularDamping;
00019                         bodies[nodeID].m_angVel.y *= angularDamping;
00020                         bodies[nodeID].m_angVel.z *= angularDamping;
00021                         
00022                         b3Float4 angvel = bodies[nodeID].m_angVel;
00023 
00024                         float fAngle = b3Sqrt(b3Dot3F4(angvel, angvel));
00025                         
00026                         //limit the angular motion
00027                         if(fAngle*timeStep > BT_GPU_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD)
00028                         {
00029                                 fAngle = BT_GPU_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD / timeStep;
00030                         }
00031                         if(fAngle < 0.001f)
00032                         {
00033                                 // use Taylor's expansions of sync function
00034                                 axis = angvel * (0.5f*timeStep-(timeStep*timeStep*timeStep)*0.020833333333f * fAngle * fAngle);
00035                         }
00036                         else
00037                         {
00038                                 // sync(fAngle) = sin(c*fAngle)/t
00039                                 axis = angvel * ( b3Sin(0.5f * fAngle * timeStep) / fAngle);
00040                         }
00041                         
00042                         b3Quat dorn;
00043                         dorn.x = axis.x;
00044                         dorn.y = axis.y;
00045                         dorn.z = axis.z;
00046                         dorn.w = b3Cos(fAngle * timeStep * 0.5f);
00047                         b3Quat orn0 = bodies[nodeID].m_quat;
00048                         b3Quat predictedOrn = b3QuatMul(dorn, orn0);
00049                         predictedOrn = b3QuatNormalized(predictedOrn);
00050                         bodies[nodeID].m_quat=predictedOrn;
00051                 }
00052                 //linear velocity               
00053                 bodies[nodeID].m_pos +=  bodies[nodeID].m_linVel * timeStep;
00054                 
00055                 //apply gravity
00056                 bodies[nodeID].m_linVel += gravityAcceleration * timeStep;
00057                 
00058         }
00059         
00060 }
00061 
00062 inline void b3IntegrateTransform( __global b3RigidBodyData_t* body, float timeStep, float angularDamping, b3Float4ConstArg gravityAcceleration)
00063 {
00064         float BT_GPU_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD = (0.25f * 3.14159254f);
00065         
00066         if( (body->m_invMass != 0.f))
00067         {
00068                 //angular velocity
00069                 {
00070                         b3Float4 axis;
00071                         //add some hardcoded angular damping
00072                         body->m_angVel.x *= angularDamping;
00073                         body->m_angVel.y *= angularDamping;
00074                         body->m_angVel.z *= angularDamping;
00075                         
00076                         b3Float4 angvel = body->m_angVel;
00077                         float fAngle = b3Sqrt(b3Dot3F4(angvel, angvel));
00078                         //limit the angular motion
00079                         if(fAngle*timeStep > BT_GPU_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD)
00080                         {
00081                                 fAngle = BT_GPU_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD / timeStep;
00082                         }
00083                         if(fAngle < 0.001f)
00084                         {
00085                                 // use Taylor's expansions of sync function
00086                                 axis = angvel * (0.5f*timeStep-(timeStep*timeStep*timeStep)*0.020833333333f * fAngle * fAngle);
00087                         }
00088                         else
00089                         {
00090                                 // sync(fAngle) = sin(c*fAngle)/t
00091                                 axis = angvel * ( b3Sin(0.5f * fAngle * timeStep) / fAngle);
00092                         }
00093                         b3Quat dorn;
00094                         dorn.x = axis.x;
00095                         dorn.y = axis.y;
00096                         dorn.z = axis.z;
00097                         dorn.w = b3Cos(fAngle * timeStep * 0.5f);
00098                         b3Quat orn0 = body->m_quat;
00099 
00100                         b3Quat predictedOrn = b3QuatMul(dorn, orn0);
00101                         predictedOrn = b3QuatNormalized(predictedOrn);
00102                         body->m_quat=predictedOrn;
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 //apply gravity
00106                 body->m_linVel += gravityAcceleration * timeStep;
00107 
00108                 //linear velocity               
00109                 body->m_pos +=  body->m_linVel * timeStep;
00110                 
00111         }
00112         
00113 }
